title: Kendra Wilkinson dresses up as a skeleton for a Hollywood Halloween party
text:
Kendra Wilkinson has slipped into another Halloween costume after dressing up as a sexy mermaid at Paris Hilton's Halloween party on Thursday.

The blonde Playboy cover girl was seen in a skeleton Halloween costume when out with friends in Hollywood on Sunday.

The 34-year-old is best known for her reality TV show The Girls Next Door as well as her own spinoff Kendra.

Scary look: Kendra Wilkinson was seen in a skeleton Halloween costume when out with friends in Hollywood on Sunday

The former nude model wore a black outfit with white skeleton bones painted on top all over her body.

The blonde bombshell showed off her slim physique as she rocked the skin-tight one-piece outfit that showed off her trim arms. She added black boots.

And at one point she had a mask on.

And the ex of the late Playboy founder Hugh Hefner was seen with two friends - a woman and a man - as they walked past a parking lot.

Spooky siren: The former nude model wore a black outfit with white skeleton bones painted on top all over her body

Last week, the TV star transformed into a sexy mermaid as she left the Beverly Hills bash that Paris hosted.

Kendra was arm-in-arm with her friend, billionaire Donald DJ Friese.

The former waitress wore a glossy emerald green maxi dress with thigh-high slit, and a white seashell design bra top.

The star wore her dark blonde hair down in loose, mermaid-esque waves, which was topped off with a glittering crown.

Her pals: The cover girl was seen with two pals - a man and a woman - as they walked past a parking lot

Even after a fun-filled night out in her high heels, the star looked like she was still having a blast as she left the bash with her pal.

Donald showed off his patriotic side wearing a red, white, and blue cowboy hat.

Though Donald and Kendra looked pretty cosy, the reality star has insisted they are just friends.

Earlier this month Kendra set the record straight on their relationship, after photographs of the duo holding hands emerged.

Making a splash! Wilkinson was a sexy mermaid as she attended Paris Hilton's Halloween party in Beverly Hills on Thursday with her friend, Donald DJ Friese

Her little ones: Kendra is single again after divorcing Hank Baskett, who she shares daughter Alijah Mary Baskett, five, and son Hank Baskett IV, nine, with; here they are seen in Calabasas

'Last night I step out with my friend,' she wrote on Instagram. 'We look like we are dating but we are definitely not. It's a very strange time right now with new people in my life and trusting people all over again is very scary.'

'I try to just go with the flow and do what makes me happy and what makes my soul smile but sometimes bites my butt and I wake up and have to answer to people about a picture they see.

'I do believe in love and I do believe I will in time find my soul mate but for now mama is just having fun exploring my new life. I'm healthy and kids are great and for now that still remains top priority. I pray pray pray so hard that the choices I'm making now are right. I'm a fragile a** mother f***** right now. Giving this thing called life everything I got and more.'

Kendra is single again after divorcing Hank Baskett, who she shares daughter Alijah Mary Baskett, five, and son Hank Baskett IV, nine, with.
description: The blonde Playboy cover girl was seen in a skeleton Halloween costume when out with friends in Hollywood on Sunday. The 34-year-old is best known for her reality TV show The Girls Next Door.
